name: Front Point Partners
overview:
FrontPoint Partners LLC, a subsidiary of Morgan Stanley, is an integrated investment management company producing a diverse group of alternative investment strategies off a central platform. Each strategy aims to deliver risk-adjusted absolute returns uncorrelated to broad market indices.

FrontPoint’s investment strategies are managed by experienced portfolio teams, each specializing in a particular industry sector, security class or regional economy. Teams utilize a “skills-based” investment process designed to take advantage of the depth of expertise and relationships in their focus area.
